page.title: 04EVENTS LLANBRYNMAIR SHOW
page.content: Every year we have an Annual Show at the end of August.We have a Carnival at the beginning of the show where all the floats and people who dress up and parade in a procession which comes through {Wynnstay}village on the main road and into the show field by the school.In the show field the fancy dress is judged in age groups and anyone can take part.People bring flowers and vegetables to compete against each other in a contest.We have dog and horse competitions as well where horses and dogs come with their owners to be judged.We have a sheep shearing competition as well where people shear the sheep .There are many activities for children like bouncy castle and small motor bikes to ride on We have sports activities as well for children of all ages.
